Research Triangle.title: Research Triangle
Research Triangle.byline: Sprawling in the heart of North Carolina's Piedmont, the Research Triangle is a metro area of about two million people.

Resen.title: Resen
Resen.byline: Resen (Macedonian: Ресен) is a city in southwestern North Macedonia.

Resende.title: Resende
Resende.byline: Resende is a city in the state of Rio de Janeiro.

Reserva de la Biósfera Calakmul.title: Reserva de la Biósfera Calakmul
Reserva de la Biósfera Calakmul.byline: The Reserva de la Biósfera de Calakmul is in the state of Campeche in the Yucatán Peninsula.

Resistencia.title: Resistencia
Resistencia.byline: Resistencia is a city in Chaco, Argentina.

Reston.title: Reston
Reston.byline: Reston is in Virginia, United States of America) and is 20 miles (32 km) west of Washington, D.C. The population of Reston is approximately 58,000 people (2010).

Restonica Valley.title: Restonica Valley
Restonica Valley.byline: The Restonica Valley is in Upper Corsica.

Reserva de la Biosfera Barranca de Metzt.title: Reserva de la Biosfera Barranca de Metztitlán
Reserva de la Biosfera Barranca de Metzt.byline: Reserva de la Biosfera Barranca de Metztitlán is a protected biosphere reserve in the state of Hidalgo, Mexico.
